availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry H. Weaver (Harrison County, Kentucky, wool carder )

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, wool carder. Lancaster, Pennsylvania, native. Son of Jacob Weaver and Margaret Weaver. Married to Drusilla Weaver. Father of Lycurgus Weaver, Martha Weaver, Ann Weaver, Isabella Weaver, Florence Weaver, Ellen Weaver, Byron Weaver, and Erastus Weaver. Wool carder in Harrison County in 1850. Wool carder in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p.130B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 639.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #7012974, Covington Deaths, p. 256.
